Package com.espertech.esper.eeutil.domain.metric

Debug API domain model - Metric-related classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EngineMetricContextPartition
    Metric report for a context partition.
    EngineMetricDetail
    Metric information for statements.
    EngineMetricStatement
    Metric information for a statement.
    EngineMetricStatementAggregation
    Metric information for aggregations.
    EngineMetricStatementAggregationGroup
    Metric information for an aggregation group.
    EngineMetricStatementContextPartition
    Metric information for a statement context partition.
    EngineMetricStatementIndex
    Metric information for indexes.
    EngineMetricStatementMatchRecognize
    Metrics for match-recognize pattern matching.
    EngineMetricStatementMatchRecognizePartition
    Metric information for match-recognize partition-specific detail.
    EngineMetricStatementMatchRecognizeStateDetail
    Metric information for match-recognize state summary across all partitions.
    EngineMetricStatementPattern
    Metric information for EPL pattern.
    EngineMetricStatementPatternEveryDistinct
    Metric information for pattern every-distinct constructs.
    EngineMetricStatementPatternSubexpression
    Metric information for each pattern subexpression.
    EngineMetricStatementSubquery
    Metric information for subqueries.
    EngineMetricStatementTable
    Metric information pertaining to tables
    EngineMetricStatementTableRow
    Metric information for a table row.
    EngineMetricStatementView
    Metric information pertaining to data windows
    EngineMetricStatementViewContained
    Metric information for data windows that belong to other data windows i.e.
